data.title: vcflib
data.description: C++ library and cmdline tools for parsing and manipulating VCF files
data.name: vcflib

evidence: README install command: "conda install -c bioconda vcflib"

"vcflib provides methods to manipulate and interpret sequence variation described by VCF. It is both: * an API for parsing and operating on records of genomic variation... * a collection of command-line utilities"

"vclib is both a library (with an API) and a collection of useful tools. The API provides a quick and extremely permissive method to read and write VCF files.  Extensions and applications of the library provided in the included utilities (*.cpp) comprise the vast bulk of the library's utility."
